name: Break-a-Brick! (simongamedev)
description:
This is my submission for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5 made with pygame.  All of the sounds were taken from the resource page.

Any and all feedback is hugely appreciated.  

INSTRUCTIONS

-Press arrow  keys to move left and right

-Press space to release ball

-Press the down arrow to speed things up

-Lastly, BREAK ALL THEM BRICKS AND GET LOTSA POINTS!
